an5.106:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava kosambiyam viharati ghositarame.
an5.106:1.2: Atha kho ayasma anando yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
an5.106:2.1: “Kittavata nu kho, bhante, bhikkhu sanghe viharanto phasum vihareyya”ti?
an5.106:2.2: “Yato kho, ananda, bhikkhu attana silasampanno hoti, no param adhisile sampavatta;
an5.106:2.3: ettavatapi kho, ananda, bhikkhu sanghe viharanto phasum vihareyya”ti.
an5.106:3.1: “Siya pana, bhante, annopi pariyayo yatha bhikkhu sanghe viharanto phasum vihareyya”ti?
an5.106:3.3: Yato kho, ananda, bhikkhu attana silasampanno hoti, no param adhisile sampavatta;
an5.106:3.5: ettavatapi kho, ananda, bhikkhu sanghe viharanto phasum vihareyya”ti.
an5.106:4.1: “Siya pana, bhante, annopi pariyayo yatha bhikkhu sanghe viharanto phasum vihareyya”ti?
an5.106:4.3: Yato kho, ananda, bhikkhu attana silasampanno hoti, no param adhisile sampavatta;
an5.106:4.5: apannato ca hoti, tena ca apannatakena no paritassati;
an5.106:4.6: ettavatapi kho, ananda, bhikkhu sanghe viharanto phasum vihareyya”ti.
an5.106:5.1: “Siya pana, bhante, annopi pariyayo yatha bhikkhu sanghe viharanto phasum vihareyya”ti?
an5.106:5.3: Yato kho, ananda, bhikkhu attana silasampanno hoti, no param adhisile sampavatta;
an5.106:5.5: apannato ca hoti, tena ca apannatakena no paritassati;
an5.106:5.6: catunnanca jhananam abhicetasikanam ditthadhammasukhaviharanam nikamalabhi hoti akicchalabhi akasiralabhi;
an5.106:5.7: ettavatapi kho, ananda, bhikkhu sanghe viharanto phasum vihareyya”ti.
an5.106:6.1: “Siya pana, bhante, annopi pariyayo yatha bhikkhu sanghe viharanto phasum vihareyya”ti?
an5.106:6.3: Yato kho, ananda, bhikkhu attana silasampanno hoti, no param adhisile sampavatta;
an5.106:6.5: apannato ca hoti, tena ca apannatakena no paritassati;
an5.106:6.6: catunnanca jhananam abhicetasikanam ditthadhammasukhaviharanam nikamalabhi hoti akicchalabhi akasiralabhi;
an5.106:6.7: asavananca khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharati;
an5.106:6.8: ettavatapi kho, ananda, bhikkhu sanghe viharanto phasum vihareyya.
an5.106:7.1: Imamha caham, ananda, phasuvihara anno phasuviharo uttaritaro va panitataro va natthiti vadami”ti.
